definitions.text: someone who helps to open up a new line of research or technology or art
one the first colonists or settlers in a new territory
examples: they went west as pioneers with only the possessions they could carry with them

definitions.text: open up an area or prepare a way
examples: She pioneered a graduate program for women students

definitions.text: take the lead or initiative in; participate in the development of
examples: This South African surgeon pioneered heart transplants

definitions.text: open up and explore a new area
